Comments_List: Various topics in vascular biology, and experimental techniques
I obtained a broader understanding of the field of vascular biology since we covered so many topics. I also practiced skills for critiquing a paper and suggesting future experiments.
I really like the style of the course where the students primarily lead the discussion. However, the faculty were always helpful and provided valuable insight. I would not change the course.
Yes; the wide variety of topics would cater to any biologist regardless of expertise in a particular field.
Yes, I would recommend it to any student that plans on researching in a cardiovascular lab.
